nodes.speaker: Arlisle
nodes.dialogueText: Hey what's up, pal? It's good to see you. :D

nodes.speaker: Arbie
nodes.dialogueText: Arlisle seems so nice. We have so much in common.

nodes.speaker: Arbie
nodes.dialogueText: It's hard to talk at first. But...it's fun too.

nodes.speaker: Arbie
nodes.dialogueText: I hope I don't let Arlisle down...
